name: Feeding ___!
description:
Feeding ___!

Feeding ___! is a small 2D arcade game created for the Game Off 2021 Game Jam, which had the prompt "Bug".

After naming and choosing your little friend, you must feed them as many bugs as possible before the timer runs out. But watch out for wasps! They'll take away your lives... Can you grow your frog to its full size?

All assets are completely original!

The whole project is available on my GitHub page. Made with Unreal Engine 4.

Twitter: @kacey_halstead

Blog: kaceyhalstead.wordpress.com
